title: Cycle #43
content:
We received 0.84728440 BTC in stacking rewards. The total was transferred to the wrapping service (0.84677031 plus 0.00051409 BTC in fees) and wrapped to 0.84507677 xBTC.

30 members received total rewards of 0.00835798 xBTC.

1495 members received total rewards of 50,557.026446 STX (we converted 0.83672 xBTC to 50,543.030305 STX at rate of 1655 sats/stx).

The theoretical total was 51,062.040483 STX (0.29%)
